artist: Attributed to Giovanni Battista della Rovere; Attributed to Giovanni Mauro della Rovere
inscription:
Inscription

LRC, in brown: [34]; on back, in black chalk, much illegible: [CAliceni DoM ini / Idea Amicus Dei f...]
medium: Pen and brown ink and brush and wash, partially squared
provenance: Sale, Sotheby's, London, November 21, 1974, no. 27, for £100, to Moir; Alfred Moir, Santa Barbara (1974-d.2010; bequeathed to MIA)
title: Design for Angels in Pendentives
